name: Guns of the Dragon

description: The Chop Chop who appeares in this issue turns out to be the father of the future member of the Blackhawks.

name: Mad-Reporter Dave Berg Sieht Sich Um

description:
The plaintive notes of the Last Post sounded eerily over a lonely clearing in the Malayan jungle as Colour-Sergeant Jimmy Morrison mourned the loss of an old friend.
They had fought and suffered together for many years in the steamy, dangerous heat of the tropics â but not always on the same side!
name: The Bugler

description:
Like the famous Musketeers of old, the four young German pilots, fresh from training, believed in the motto, âAll for One and One for All!â
It stood them in good stead in their early combat patrols, while their Focke -Wulf Fw190s were still the scourge of the skies. But they were to need their light-hearted comradeship even more in the dark days that lay ahead for the German Luftwaffe.
name: Flying Musketeers

description:
The First World War, Mesopotamia, and First Lieutenant Paul Wardle is a doctor in the Royal Army Medical Corps. He has vowed only to save lives â never to take them â even during vicious conflict.
When he and his wounded patients are stranded on a grounded hospital ship, taken over by a ruthless German Naval commander with a grudge, the situation looks increasingly desperate. For the sake of the wounded, Paul will have to fight for their survival. Can he stick to the principles he values so highlyâ¦?
name: Mercy Mission?

description:
The North African Desert is a hostile environment at the best of times, pushing men and machines to their limits â and beyond. As a place to fight a modern mechanised war it has to be one of the worst imaginable.
Yet Major Orde Gatwin, his band of oddbods and a motley collection of experimental machinery were there and had to do just that. Would they be strong enough to survive when they were TESTED TO DESTRUCTION...
name: Tested To Destruction

description:
The Flintstones - A Puzzling Situation! - 4 pages - feat. Fred, Wilma, Gazoo

The Flintstones - The Bedrock Grand Prix - 5 pages - feat. Fred, Barney, Wilma, Betty, Pebbles

The Flintstones - Who's Who? - 1 pages - feat. Fred, Wilma

The Flintstones - Fred Finds A Friend! - 7 pages - feat. Fred, Barney, Wilma, Betty, Pebbles, Bam Bam, Dino

Chalk Dust - 1 page text story

The Flintstones - Car Thieves - 3 pages - feat. Fred, Barney, Wilma, Pebbles, Mr. Slate

The Flintstones - Better Days Are Coming - 4 pages - feat. Fred, Barney, Wilma, Betty
name: A Puzzling Situation!

description:
Notes:

  • This issue was briefly seen on The Munsters season 2 episode 4 "Herman Munster, Shutterbug".

The evil organization C.R.U.S.H. and Mad Doctor Doom have turned the town of Riverdale into a real-life horror film! Now Archie, as the special agent âMan From R.I.V.E.R.D.A.L.E.,â is face-to-face with a zombie showdown! Can Archie and his friends stop them before the whole town turns into the âWalking Dazedâ?
name: The Man from R.I.V.E.R.D.A.L.E. Part 3: The Crisis at Riverdale High

description: Sara has to make amends with an innocent man she sent to prison. Before young Sara Pezzini was called to bear the Witchblade she made a horrible mistake that destroyed a manâs life. Today that man is being released from prison and has to put the pieces of his life back together. In order to protect his family, this desperate father made a deal with demonic forces, and now it is time to pay. When Sara tries to reach out and make her past wrong right, she's confronted by demonic forces. The stakes: a man's very soul.
name: Due Process

description: Six evil guns. Four killers. One madwoman. And an undead Confederate General. How did General Hume and his cutthroats come into possession of the guns? Their storyâas well as a dark secret Drake would rather keep hiddenâis revealed as a deadly trap is sprung on forbidden land.

Bart gains a partner in crime when a new kid comes to Springfield Elementary. But it does not take long before Bart's accomplice becomes his chief competitor, prompting Bart to delve into the wannabe's mysterious past only to find himself in way over his head.
name: Bart Like Me; Single Whacked Feline

description: Join all the super-people for a super birthday party at the Fortress of Solitude! This issue is going to be super...unless you count the room full of Brainiacs! Let's hope the Brainiacs don't ruin the party.
name: Field Trippin' For Super Snow; Suddenly!

description:
A pair of NASA planes are brought down. Doctor Weltmann oversees the installation of a Lazarus Pit, in Ra's Al Ghul's hidden lair, in the Amazon rainforest. Ra's Al Ghul receives a communique from Doctor Brant Carmody. The timetable is moved up on their scheme. Carmody's son, Brant, Jr., questions his father's mysterious behavior. Carmody assures his son that everything he is doing is to make the world a better place for Brant, Jr. Grind informs Ra's Al Ghul that his daughter, Talia, has requested an audience. After purposefully making Talia wait unnecessarily, Ra's Al Ghul allows his daughter into his presence. Talia declares her loyalty to her father.

To test Talia, Ra's Al Ghul orders Grind to send an assassin, Shard, to murder the Batman. Bruce Wayne, and Tim Drake, attend Carmody's lecture on climate change. Wayne, and Drake, mingle with Carmody, and others, afterwards. Drake befriends Brant, Jr. Unbeknownst to Wayne, he is being surreptitiously observed, from afar, by Talia. Spying the Bat-Signal in the sky, Wayne, and Drake, make their farewells. Wayne, as the Batman, responds to the Bat-Signal. The Batman meets with Police Comissioner James Gordon. The Batman is shown a corpse, with a bat pinned to it. The corpse's hand has been severed.

The Batman discerns where his unknown foe is summoning him to, from clues found on the corpse. The Batman storms the Aces Club. Shard ambushes Batman. After a pitched struggle, the Batman subdues Shard. Disguising himself as Shard, the Batman locates Shard's transport, and takes it to meet Shard's master. Ra's Al Ghul makes contact with fading silver screen siren, Evelyn Grace. Ra's Al Ghul makes Grace an offer she can't refuse. Talia gets a message, from Ra's Al Ghul, to Carmody. The Batman, as Shard, is brought to the hidden lair of Ra's Al Ghul. There, "Shard" witnesses Grace being restored to her youth, and beauty, by immersion in the Lazarus Pit.

Ra's Al Ghul takes Grace as his bride. The Batman, as Shard, does some investigating, to determine Ra's Al Ghul's scheme. Ultimately, "Shard' is discovered, and revealed to be the Batman. The Batman escapes Ra's Al Ghul's headquarters. Due to their discovery, Ra's Al Ghul moves his base of operations. Ra's Al Ghul consummates his marriage to Grace. Talia comes to collect Carmody. A fire fight breaks out between Talia's forces, and Carmody's security attachment. The Batman intervenes, but not in time to save Brant, Jr, who is hit by stray gunfire. The Batman subdues Talia. The Batman makes off with Carmody, Brant Jr., and Talia.

The Batman returns to the Batcave, to get Brant, Jr. medical aid. Ra's Al Ghul's forces storm the Batcave. Ra's Al Ghul offers to use the Lazarus Pit to restore Brant, Jr. Carmody attacks the Batman. Ra's Al Ghul breaches the Batcave's defenses. Batman goes on the offensive. Against the Batman's wishes, Drake involves himself in the conflict. Drake is taken hostage by Grind. The Batman is rendered unconscious. Talia retrieves Carmody from the Batman's butler, Alfred Pennyworth. Ra's Al Ghul takes the Batman prisoner. Drake, and Pennyworth, are allowed to live. Grace reaches out to Talia, to try to forge a bond with her new daughter.

Brant, Jr. is placed In the Lazarus Pit, but all does not go well. The Batman is brought before Ra's Al Ghul, and given a choice... join Ra's Al Ghul or die. The Batman discerns where Ra's Al Ghul's new base of operations is located. Ra's Al Ghul reveals his plan to save the Earth, a plan that will also cost the lives of millions of human beings. The Batman refuses to join with Ra's Al Ghul. The Batman is carried off to his execution. Talia tries to save the Batman, only to be stopped by Grace. The Batman escapes Ra's Al Ghul's deathtrap. The Batman commandeers one of Ra's Al Ghul's aircraft, and crashes it into Ra's Al Ghul's Antarctic base.

Grace gets the drop on the Batman. Talia subdues Grace. Ra's Al Ghul attacks the Batman. Carmody prevents Grind from assassinating the Batman. Carmody kills Grind, but suffers a mortal wound in the process, Carmody races to the Lazarus Pit. Carmody falls into the Lazarus Pit, and dies. Brant, Jr. emerges from the Lazarus Pit, restored. The Batman escapes with Brant, Jr, Grace and Talia. Ra's Al Ghul is seemingly slain when a massive explosion consumes his Antarctic fortress. The Batman does not wish to discuss Talia's miscarriage, a tragic occurrence from their previous encounter. The Batman returns to the Batcave. Grace reveals, to Talia, that she is pregnant with Ra's Al Ghul's child.
name: Batman: Bride of the Demon

description: This spectacular volume collecting stories from BATMAN: GOTHAM KNIGHTS #17-49 is offered at DC's standard trim size!
name: Volume 3

description: Presented in stark black-and-white tones that all too easily represent Batman's worldview comes this collection of the Darknight Detective's hardboiled adventures. With stories and art by a stellar line-up of comic industry creators, including Neil Gaiman (THE SANDMAN), Joe Kubert (TOR), a Frank Miller (THE DARK KNIGHT RETURNS, RONIN) pin-up, Jim Lee (WILDCATS, BATMAN) and others, it's not surprising that this collection was awarded the comic industry's prestigious Eisner Award for excellence.
name: Volume 1

description: A recently retired, convalescing Jim Gordon, takes a trip to the shore for some much-deserved rest and relaxation. Soon after he registers at an old seaside resort, a body shows up and a murder-mystery is suddenly his to unravel! But will his investigation be derailed by a Batman-obsessed youngster?

name: Bachiye Madam
Valentine
Hey Ram
Torcher

description: The final leg of the Royal Scavenger Hunt leads Dane and Maya to the enlightened paths of Misty Mountain. With only one Chaos Stone left to retrieve, a powerful beast attacks as they realize that the outcome of their mission could decide the fate of the world! Don't miss this exciting conclusion!
name: Chaos
Jalianwala
Aaj mat Jaa
Jara Bach Ke
Chaar Kilometer Aage
BodyGuard

description: Can the new Batman maintain his grip on Gotham City's criminal element? With Bruce Wayne gone in the wake of Batman: R.I.P., Dick Grayson â formerly known as both Robin and Nightwing â becomes the new Batman. And it's not long before the city's criminals put him to the test! With the Penguin intent on becoming Gotham's new crime kingpin and Two-Face waging a war of his own, how can any hero, let alone one who's just stepped into his role, stop them? It won't be easy â especially since he also has to round up a posse of escaped Arkham Asylum inmates.
name: TPB

description: "Frostbite" continues with The Spirit on thin ice â literally! As Central City is engulfed in a whiteout blizzard, Ebony's on the brink of death and The Spirit must carry her across town to save her life â with every hood in town baying for their blood! And in the co-feature, THE SPIRIT: BLACK and WHITE, Stray Bullets and YOUNG LIARS scribe David Lapham teams with MADAME XANADU master Michael Wm. Kaluta to tell the tale of the deadliest New Year's ever! It's "666 in 10â¦ 9â¦ 8â¦"
name: Frostbite: Part Two

description:
Sarah Holmes has had a hard life, with an absent father and a mother who makes a habit of abusive boyfriends. Now her life is about to take a very unexpected turn as a chance encounter with Alice and Dorothy sets in motion events that will change Oz and Wonderland forever. A bold new chapter in The Oz/Wonderland Chronicles begins in this prequel series, giving insight into the past of Alice Liddell, Dorothy Gale, and Mae Mannering.

Prelude to Evil #1 takes place 63 days before "J-Day"

volume.name: The Oz/Wonderland Chronicles: Prelude to Evil

description:
The fate of comics' strangest super-team is revealed in this volume collecting DOOM PATROL #102-121! Don't miss the original team's final battles with General Immortus, The Brotherhood of Evil and the Animal-Vegetable-Mineral Man.

The Rage of the Wrecker

The Death of the Doom Patrol

With so many secrets revealed, Kaoru's life has been turned upside down. He must handle his own issues before taking on more responsibility. Tina and Aoi must confront their own feelings before facing each other. Love is still in the air and Chizuru is hoping to get a big whiff.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 119: Daijoubu - I'm All Right
  • Chapter 120: Sansha - Third Wheel
  • Chapter 121: Kokuhaku - Confession
  • Chapter 122: Kyuukoku - Urgent Notice
  • Chapter 123: Kaikou - Unexpected Meeting
  • Chapter 124: Fumie - Rebuke
  • Chapter 125: Jubaku - Curse
  • Chapter 126: Shukui - Old Grudge
  • Special Chapter: Osananajimi - Childhood Friends
name: Vol. 15

description:
With Aoi missing, Kaoru is sick with worry. Tina suggests that they visit Aoi...but before they can, Miyabi returns with some shocking news. The boarding house is closed, and everyone has one night to pack their belongings and leave! Meanwhile, the other âKaoruâ continues to woo Aoi, since he will inherit the Hanabishi family fortune. Will Kaoru's true love be lost forever?

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 127: Imachi - Sitting and Waiting
  • Chapter 128: Souji - Resemblance
  • Chapter 129: Utakata - Transience
  • Chapter 130: Shitsuren - Lost Love
  • Chapter 131: Houteki - Abandonment
  • Chapter 132: Tsuikai - Remembrance
  • Chapter 133: Gizetsu - Disownment
  • Special Chapter: Hanakotoba - Language of Flowers
name: Vol. 16

description:
All great harem stories must come to a close. Aoi finally acknowledges for whom her heart pants--Kaoru. She doesn't want to marry his evil younger brother. It seems that Kaoru must figure out what to do with his brother and the harem if he really wants to share his life with Aoi. Tina also has feelings for Kaoru. Will this story have a happy ending?Â 

Chapter TitlesÂ 

  • Chapter 134:Â Gakai - Fatal Flaw
  • Chapter 135:Â Sokai - Cherished Hope
  • Chapter 136:Â Tsugai - Pair
  • Chapter 137:Â Kinuzure - Rustling of Clothes
  • Chapter 138:Â Kizuna - Bond
  • Chapter 139:Â Shutsuran - Bluer
  • Chapter 140:Â Hanamuke - Farewell Gift
  • Final Chapter: Ranjou - True Blue
name: Vol. 17

description: It all begins here. The epic fantasy series for those that enjoy Lord of the Rings, The Hobbit, Dungeons and Dragons, and Game of Thrones. Here is the introductory issue and sets the stage for the magic and Middle Earth adventures that will be unveiled. Four normal modern day teenagers are plunged into a world they thought only existed in novels and film. They are whisked away to a magical land where dragons roam the skies, orcs and hobgoblins terrorize weary travelers, dark magic consumes kingdoms, and where unicorns prance through the forest. It is a world where man is just one race, joining other races such as elves, trolls, dwarves, changelings, and the dreaded creatures who steal the night. This is not a typical "dungeons and dragons" world, for this world follows the adventures of these wayward teens into the unknown as we watch the world unfold in front of their (and our) eyes. Luckily for some of them, they are saved and then joined by an escaped slave, the female elven named Silverfawn. It was a world of magic, of enchantment, of adventure and of death.
name: Time Slip; The First Time

description: Dominic buys Marjorie's freedom, the group plans on finding Lord Darkoth and freeing Sandra, Marjorie finds out she has healing powers.
name: The Search

description: The group finds Castle Darkoth where Sandra is being held, but will find themselves having trouble getting in seeing how it's on tons of rock...floating over a lake! Ultimately finding their way in, they come up against the Hobgoblins, the personal guards of Lord Darkoth and soon realize that they were led into a trap and one by one, they fall.
name: The Siege

description: Darkoth teleports the group into the woods, but Sandra stays behind to become the Queen of Drohm.
name: Of Damsels and Darklords; It's A Small World

description:
Rubaton, the trading capital of all the Realm. You can find anything in Rubatonâ¦for a price as Dom soon discovers. Alex âmeetsâ Letha Kazan at the local tavern and who will be a major character later in the series. Meanwhile, Lord Darkoth prepares for conquest and will lead the Realm into a war which will rip the land apart.

Dark Prince Thorag makes plans against Darkoth while Darkoth schemes to defeat the Rainbow Elves.
name: Rubaton

description: Marjorie finds herself compelled to believe in different things and pulls away from Alex after discovering him with the female warrior Letha Kazen. Darkoth uses the hidden talents of Sandra to summon the Shinde Imas - the Elf Slayer, as he continues his plans to conquer the Realm.
name: Ogre, Ogre

description: Shinde Imas starts killing elves, Norvose and company battle the Epicians, night monsters attack Darkoth.
name: To kill the Darklord

description: Evan battles Sandra, Marjorie creates fire to thwart the river trolls, Alex tries to make peace with Marjorie.
name: The Trouble With Trolls

description: The group lands in the Carahill city of Dendera, and Letha tells them she cannot continue with them.
name: Letha's song

description: The group, arriving at the great wall of Ardonia, gets an earful of history by Grappo.
name: Hail To Our Queen

description: The gang and a group of White Unicorns check out the unusual circumstances surrounding the hamlet of Kirwood, Alex and Marjorie run into Terrorek at the local church.
name: A Night On The Town

description: The group battles night creatures in Kirkwood, Alex finds he can do magic again.
name: Let The Fights Begin
